bill_profile.bill_title: Patient Access to Health Care Services
bill_profile.bill_summary: Relates to the Help Efficient, Accessible, Low-cost, Timely Healthcare (HEALTH) Act; encourages speedy resolution of claims; provides for damages, that the court shall have the power to restrict the payment of a contingent fee, that no punitive damages may be awarded against the manufacturer or distributor of a medical product that complies with FDA standards, that a health care provider who prescribes a medical product approved by the FDA shall not be named as a party to a product liability lawsuit.

bill_profile.bill_summary: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to consolidate the reporting obligations of the Federal Communications Commission in order to improve congressional oversight and reduce reporting burdens; specifies the content requirements for such reports to include competition in the marketplace, the state of communications deployment, whether the laws and regulations pose a barrier to competitive entry into the marketplace, video programming competition, a listing of unserved areas, and cable industry prices.

bill_profile.bill_summary: Amends the Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act of 1977 to clarify that uncertified States and Indian tribes have the authority to use certain payments for certain noncoal reclamation projects and acid mine remediation programs.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on ENERGY AND NATURAL RESOURCES.

bill_profile.bill_summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide expensing for small businesses.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on FINANCE.

bill_profile.bill_title: Civil Penalties for Institutions of Higher Education
bill_profile.bill_location: Senate Health, Education, Labor and Pensions Committee
bill_profile.bill_summary: Increases civil penalties for institutions of higher education that fail to comply with the Jeanne Clery Disclosure of Campus Security Policy and Campus Crime Statistics Act.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on HEALTH, EDUCATION, LABOR AND PENSIONS.

bill_profile.bill_title: Congressional Budget for United States Government
bill_profile.bill_summary: Sets forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2013, revising the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal year 2012, and setting forth the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2013 through 2022.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To SENATE Committee on BUDGET.
In SENATE. Discharged from SENATE Committee on BUDGET pursuant to Section 300 of the Congressional Budget Act.
In SENATE. Placed on SENATE Legislative Calendar.

bill_profile.bill_summary: Commends the 80 brave men who became known as the "Doolittle Tokyo Raiders" for outstanding heroism, valor, skill, and service to the United States during the bombing of Tokyo and 5 other targets on the island of Honshu on April 18, 1942, during the Second World War.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To SENATE Committee on ARMED SERVICES.
